channel.title: Titanfall
channel.description:
Anybody else getting this? I pre-ordered it and paid in full for the Xbox360 version. The game looks pretty epic so I'm excited. If anybody else is getting it add me on Xbox. My gmrtag is sgtAline.
[center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1t11klyI91g[/youtube][/center]

item.title: Titanfall
item.dc:creator: @Jordan_Hunt Jordan Hunt
item.description:
@Jordan_Hunt wrote:

This game is awesome. I’m currently rank 48. I haven’t gotten bored of it or felt it was generic yet. If anybody is playing this on 360 add me. Again my GT is sgtAline

Read full topic

item.title: Titanfall
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:10, topic:540776”][quote author=Frell link=topic=659643.msg4411290#msg4411290 date=1393809642]

Was in the beta, is way more boring than it looks. It feels fresh and unique for the first 3 matches and then you just get bored with it

I played the beta, I though it was really cool. I like when you get the titan because they own.
It’s like mirrors edge + halo hybrid

I think the raw game without the titans would be more fun than it is with the Titans. I feel like they only added titans so kids would get all hippy about them.
[/quote]
The raw game without the titans would just be Crisis lol.[/quote]
More like mirrors edge

Read full topic
